title: What champ should I main. Help
body: Can u watch my replays and tell me wat champ is right 4 me. My summoner names are H0n0urMeH0n0urU2 and Your Cousi. Thx alot

replies.body:
Hey there,

This board is mainly for Help & Support regarding technical issues with the game, for more information on this board please see [this](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/cfW5MUup-welcome-to-the-help-support-board) thread.

Your thread would be better suited for the [Gameplay & Strategy](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy) Board or the [Misc](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous) board.
